title: Mirror of Germany. No. 266 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Germany (West) - Politics and government
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The Daimler Benz Company produces 370,000 cars a year; election campaign in Germany - portraits of the leading candidates; Constance, in the extreme south of the Federal Republic, a medieval town which owes its attractions largely to its geographical situation on the banks of Lake constance; to mark the 30th anniversary of the founding of UNICEF, members of the famous choir, the Schoneberger Sangerknaben or the singing boys of Schoneberg return to West Berlin for one day; The 13th World Go-cart championships along the course of the city of Hagen.
